revised_title: Molecular Modelling of Carbonate Minerals: Surface Structure and Growth Morphology
tldr: The authors developed a computer simulation technique to predict the surface structure, morphology, and growth rate of carbonates. They used energy minimization and molecular modelling to study the effect of additives on the surface structure and morphology of calcite. This technique provides a valuable link between microscopic and bulk behavior, offering insights into the crystallochemical factors responsible for nucleation and growth in inorganic and biological systems.
